A test I sent to a small group all localized in the United States eventually went through as sent but not delivered. Another test I sent to a larger, global group has still not been marked sent. I sent a second test to the first group and it took up to 60 seconds to get the first tick.

Edit: now has second tick. Outage might be over.

Edit 2: message to global group sent but not delivered after ~22m.
